name: John W. CAMPBELL, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND INDUSTRY, OFFICE OF EMPLOYMENT SECURITY
name_abbreviation: Campbell v. Commonwealth, Department of Labor & Industry

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON^, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: John W. CAMPBELL, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND INDUSTRY, OFFICE OF EMPLOYMENT SECURITY.

opinions.text:
PER CURIAM.
Appeal quashed.
LARSEN and PAPADAKOS, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Richard C. Lengler, Asst. Chief Counsel, Frank A. Fisher, Jr., Deputy Atty. Gen., Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
490 A.2d 831
John W. CAMPBELL, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND INDUSTRY, OFFICE OF EMPLOYMENT SECURITY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 16, 1985.
Decided April 23, 1985.
John W. Campbell, pro se.
Richard C. Lengler, Asst. Chief Counsel, Frank A. Fisher, Jr., Deputy Atty. Gen., Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON^, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
